description.en: A question where students select one correct answer from multiple options.
description.nl: Een vraag waarbij studenten één correct antwoord selecteren uit meerdere opties.

settings.name: Multiple choice answer options
settings.description: An array of option strings that represent the choices to the student. Each value can contain HTML.

settings.name: Correct answer
settings.description: The string of the correct answer value, matching the `value` field of the options. Needs to be an exact match to one of the options.
